name: backend-msl-app
description: Backend API para sistema MSL (Medical Science Liaison)

scripts.debug: SLS_DEBUG=* DEBUG=* node --inspect /usr/local/bin/serverless offline start --apiKey F8mhwFjI2Ueo2BqPWr6AXC2Z-YpS073JJqstcVk
scripts.dev: npm run husky && nodemon --exec 'sls offline start --noAuth --apiKey F8mhwFjI2Ueo2BqPWr6AXC2Z-YpS073JJqstcVk'
scripts.husky: rm -rf .husky && husky && echo "npm run build" > .husky/pre-commit && chmod +x .husky/pre-commit && git add .husky/pre-commit
scripts.build:ci: npm run prettier && npm run standard
scripts.build: npm run prettier && npm run standard && npm run console
